item.title: Account Exploring
item.description: TrueBlocks data On its own blockchain data is an unintelligable blob of binary bytes. But, we all know there is an amazing collection of deeply interesting information contained therein. Thousands of people are trading, voting, expressing their preferences, making markets for valueless items every minute. What interests us about this data are answers to questions such as: What exaclty is going on? Where is my money? Didn’t I have some of those tokens somewhere?
